title: 85: Getting Chatty w/ Comedian Michael Yo
itunes:title: 85: Getting Chatty w/ Comedian Michael Yo
description:
The Broads are joined by the hilarious comedian entertainer extraordinaire Michael Yo! They discuss his upbringing, being Khloe & Kourtney’s ex boss, KABOOM!, fatherhood, the comedian community, a little bit of The Bachelor, and much more! 
MICHAEL YO:
Follow him on instagram @michaelyo
Check out his podcast: The Michael Yo Show https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/michael-yo-show/id1475116900
And new Amazon special “BLASIAN” https://amzn.to/2FDdxtX
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:
***ROTHYS: Go to Rothys.com/chatty (http://rothys.com/chatty) to get your new favorite flats
***MODERN FERTILITY: Get $20 off the test when you go to http://modernfertility.com/chatty
*** HELLO FRESH: Get $80 off your first month of HelloFresh by going to HelloFresh.com/ (http://hellofresh.com/) CHATTY80 and entering code CHATTY80
*** STAMPS.COM (http://stamps.com/) : Get a special offer that includes a 4-week trial PLUS free postage AND a digital scale by going to Stamps.com (http://stamps.com/) , click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
